body: Carr was a British artist, whose homebase was Liverpool in County Lancashire in Northern England. Considered a regional artist, he specialized in sporting and animal art. Not much is known of him; however, he is known to have exhibited at Walker Art Gallery in Liverpool.
artOnWallAltText: Henry Carr - Dogs in the Field Victorian Painting
dimensions: Oil on board, 11.25 x 15.25 inches/Signed lower right
metaTitle: Henry Carr - Dogs in the Field Victorian Painting
mainImageAltText: Henry Carr - Dogs in the Field Victorian Painting
metaDescription: Explore Henry Carr's Dogs in the Field, a charming Victorian painting that captures the playful energy of dogs in a picturesque countryside.
title: In the Field
